Gubernur Sulsel Umumkan UMP Sulsel 2020 Rp 3,1 Juta
01 Nov 2019, 06:44 by Muhammad Nur Abdurrahman


Gubernur Sulawesi Selatan Nurdin Abdullah/Foto: Pemprov Sulawesi Selatan

Makassar - Gubernur Sulawesi Selatan Nurdin Abdullah mengumumkan Upah Minimum Provinsi (UMP) tahun 2020 sebesar Rp 3.103.830. Pemberlakuan UMP ini akan dimulai pada 1 Januari 2020 mendatang.Nurdin yang turut didampingi Kepala Dinas Tenaga Kerja Sulsel Agustinus Appang, di Baruga Lounge, kantor Gubernur Sulsel, Makassar, Jumat (1/11/2019), mengatakan UMP 2020 mengalami kenaikan 8,51 persen, dari UMP 2019 sebesar Rp 2.860.382. "Kenaikan UMP berdasarkan formula perhitungan Upah PP No. 78 Tahun 2015 tentang Pengupahan dan surat edaran Kemnaker, yang didasarkan pada data Tingkat Inflasi Nasional 3,32% dan Pertumbuhan Ekonomi Nasional Tahun 2019 sebesar 5,19 persen," ujar Nurdin.Nurdin berharap, pemberlakuan UMP 2020 akan meningkatkan produktivitas dan kesejahteraan tenaga kerja di Sulsel. Selain itu, juga dapat menjaga dan meningkatkan iklim investasi di Sulsel.Berdasarkan kenaikan UMP yang diumumkan Kementerian Tenaga Kerja, di wilayah Sulawesi, UMP tertinggi dipegang Sulawesi Utara, yakni sebesar Rp 3.310.722, sedangkan UMP terendah Sulawesi Tengah, sebesar Rp 2.303.710. UMP tiga provinsi lainnya Gorontalo, Sulawesi Tenggara, dan Sulawesi Barat berada di angka rata-rata Rp 2,5 juta.Simak Video "Asyik! UMP Tahun 2020 Naik 8,51%"[Gambas:Video 20detik](mna/ara)

Governor of South Sulawesi Announces 2020 South Sulawesi UMP Rp 3.1 Million
Nov 01 2019, 06:44 by Muhammad Nur Abdurrahman


South Sulawesi Governor Nurdin Abdullah / Photo: Provincial Government of South Sulawesi

Makassar - South Sulawesi Governor Nurdin Abdullah announced the Provincial Minimum Wage (UMP) in 2020 of Rp 3,103,830. The enactment of this UMP will begin on January 1, 2020. Nurdin who was also accompanied by the Head of the South Sulawesi Manpower Agency Agustinus Appang, in Baruga Lounge, the office of the Governor of South Sulawesi, Makassar, Friday (1/11/2019), said the 2020 UMP experienced an increase of 8.51 percent, from the 2019 UMP amounting to Rp 2,860,382. "The increase in the UMP is based on the formula for calculating Wages PP No. 78 of 2015 concerning Wages and Circular of the Ministry of Manpower, which is based on data of the National Inflation Rate of 3.32% and National Economic Growth in 2019 of 5.19 percent," Nurdin said. Nurdin hoped, The enactment of the UMP 2020 will increase labor productivity and welfare in South Sulawesi. In addition, it can also maintain and improve the investment climate in South Sulawesi. Based on the increase in the UMP announced by the Ministry of Manpower, in Sulawesi, the highest UMP is held in North Sulawesi, amounting to Rp3,310,722, while the lowest UMP in Central Sulawesi, amounting to Rp2,303,710 . The UMP of the three other provinces Gorontalo, Southeast Sulawesi and West Sulawesi are in the average of Rp 2.5 million. Watch Video "Fun!
